comments.body: This is a clever idea. I wish we had a more general way to manipulate the original graph and add the extra node directly. That would avoid the need to instantiate a separate interpreter just to resize the image. Anyway, no action required. This is just food for thought.

This idea is actually stolen from [ReadTensorFromImageFile()](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/examples/label_image/main.cc#L114) of the original `tensorflow/examples/label_image/` :-)
